usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts at home, in gyms, or in fitness classes.
key_features: Pair of 1 KG dumbbells for a total of 2 KG weight
Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Anti-slip neoprene surface for a secure, comfortable grip
Printed weight and brand on end caps for easy identification
Color-coded pink design to quickly spot the correct weight
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Suitable for home gyms, fitness classes, and resistance training
Compact size for easy storage in small workout spaces
ai_description: Pair of pink KAKSS 1 KG neoprene dumbbells with hexagonal, non-roll design and printed weight on the ends. Cast iron cores with anti-slip coating offer secure grip for home workouts, resistance training, and fitness routines in compact spaces.
target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, and fitness enthusiasts looking for light, non-slip dumbbells for strength and toning workouts.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
